title: 2 bedroom, ground floor with small yard in downtown Concord
posting_body: ['Great Mid-Century Modern, single story, ground floor, corner unit.', 'Includes a private fenced rear yard.', 'Stainless electric kitchen with solid surface Quartz countertops & white cabinets.', 'Double pane windows with blinds.', 'All hard surface plank flooring throughout.', ' Quiet community includes swimming pool, off-street parking, & coin laundry.', 'Unit also includes laundry hook-ups for stack washer & dryer.', 'Cordova Apartment Homes are located at the end of a cul-de-sac and walking distance to BART, Safeway, CVS, & the shops & restaurants of the vibrant downtown Todos Santos Square.', 'Accessibility:', '- Grab Bars in Bathroom', 'Amenities:', '- Parking - off-street', '- Pool - newly remodeled', '- Unfurnished', '- Smoke Free - designated smoking area outdoors at property.', '- Yard - private fenced', '- Patio - seperate front patio', 'Appliances:', '- Air Conditioning - mini-split seperately controlled', '- Dishwasher - stainless', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Range - stainless glass-top', '- Refrigerator - stainless', '- Washer & Dryer Hookup - stack hook-ups', '- Washer & Dryer On-Site - community coin laundry', 'LeaseLengths:', '- 12 Months lease - 1 year lease, then Mo-to-Mo', 'Pets:', '- Cats Allowed - on approval', '- Small Dogs Allowed - on approval', '- Large Dogs Allowed - on approval', 'Utilities:', '- Trash Pick-up', 'Included', '- Resident Pays Electricity - PG&E', '- Resident Pays Heat - electric', '- Resident Pays Water - Contra Costa Water', '- High-Speed Internet Available - Wave & Comcast', 'Contact Cordova Apartment Homes at', 'show contact info', 'for more information']
